mods.abstract: 7247th broadcast of WFAA's Early Bird Show. Originally broadcast 1953-04-29, part 1. Featuring announcer John Allen, hosts Elmer Baughman as Mister Hack Berry and Ben McCleskey as Little Willie, and performers Bob Shelton, Lynn Hoyt, Bert Noyd, George Kent, the Quartet, and the Early Bird Orchestra directed by "Deacon" Wilbur Ard. Sponsored by Earl Hayes Chevrolet and Mennen Co.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
